subject: Re: [junit] OT: final
msgSnippet: ... I haven t read this whole thread, but I thought I d chime in at this point.  A friend of mine recently pointed me towards this document that claims that
messageBody:
--- Mike Clark <mike@...> wrote:
> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> >In this case, my disciplined use of final helps the
> compiler/interpreter/whatever optimize on my behalf, nothing more.
>
> Really? Have you measured the impact?

I haven't read this whole thread, but I thought I'd chime in at this
point. A friend of mine recently pointed me towards this document that
claims that final doesn't get you faster:

http://www-900.ibm.com/developerWorks/cn/java/j-jtp1029/index_eng.shtml

It was written in October 2002, but I think its still accurate.

Kevin
